screens.description:
This is where it all happens. Collect any information here, set variable values, run components, etc.
Individual components can have their visibility filtered by whether or not athe current Flow Active Stages contains the ticket (Stage) name.
screens.name: Ticket_Screen
screens.label: Ticket Screen

variables.description: Holds the Record ID of the record on the Lightning Record Page that this component is called from
variables.name: recordId
